column4: Hey all, I was just wondering, in terms of function and possibly opinion, if my feisty install is working, and I have compiz...given that people have had problems upgrading, is there a real reason I should attempt it/
I upgraded from feisty to gutsy and I am using an ATI built in video card and compiz-fusion worked like a charm
That's not my concern really...but...see right up what I just said to pj
